author: abcoathup
content: You can participate in the Goerli supply discussion on Eth Magicians: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/testnet-workgroup-paths-out-of-the-goerli-supply-mess/11453

author: potuz
content: Not an answer to your question but I'd ask why they need Goerli at all, Sepolia should be a much nicer network to test unless you want to test staking scenarios

author: timbeiko
content: Current infra support for Goerli (and lack for Sepolia) is one of the things mentioned

author: timbeiko
content: Shared state too, to some extent
